Segment.name: G55
Segment.comment: To provide physical characteristics relative to a consumer unit

Field.name: ProductServiceIdQualifier1
Field.comment: Code identifying the type/source of the descriptive number used in Product/Service ID (234)

Field.name: ProductServiceId1
Field.comment: Identifying number for a product or service

Field.name: ProductServiceIdQualifier2
Field.comment: Code identifying the type/source of the descriptive number used in Product/Service ID (234)

Field.name: ProductServiceId2
Field.comment: Identifying number for a product or service

Field.name: Height
Field.comment: Vertical dimension of an object measured when the object is in the upright position

Field.name: UnitOrBasisForMeasurementCode1
Field.comment: Code specifying the units in which a value is being expressed, or manner in which a measurement has been taken

Field.name: Width
Field.comment: Shorter measurement of the two horizontal dimensions measured with the object in the upright position

Field.name: UnitOrBasisForMeasurementCode2
Field.comment: Code specifying the units in which a value is being expressed, or manner in which a measurement has been taken

Field.name: Length
Field.comment: Largest horizontal dimension of an object measured when the object is in the upright position

Field.name: UnitOrBasisForMeasurementCode3
Field.comment: Code specifying the units in which a value is being expressed, or manner in which a measurement has been taken

Field.name: Volume
Field.comment: Value of volumetric measure

Field.name: UnitOrBasisForMeasurementCode4
Field.comment: Code specifying the units in which a value is being expressed, or manner in which a measurement has been taken

Field.name: Pack
Field.comment: The number of inner containers, or number of eaches if there are no inner containers, per outer container

Field.name: Size
Field.comment: Size of supplier units in pack

Field.name: UnitOrBasisForMeasurementCode5
Field.comment: Code specifying the units in which a value is being expressed, or manner in which a measurement has been taken

Field.name: CashRegisterItemDescription1
Field.comment: The cash register description of an item

Field.name: CashRegisterItemDescription2
Field.comment: The cash register description of an item

Field.name: CouponFamilyCode
Field.comment: A code assigned by the vendor to a single item or to families of consumer items that can be used by in-store scanners in conjunction with a UPC coupon value code for instant credit when the proper item has been purchased

Field.name: DatedProductNumberOfDays
Field.comment: Used to designate the number of days open dated product must 'sell by' from date of manufacture

Field.name: DepositValue
Field.comment: To designate the value for returnable containers

Field.name: YesNoConditionOrResponseCode
Field.comment: Code indicating a Yes or No condition or response

Field.name: Color
Field.comment: Free-form description of color

Field.name: UnitWeight1
Field.comment: Numeric value of weight per unit

Field.name: WeightQualifier1
Field.comment: Code defining the type of weight

Field.name: WeightUnitCode1
Field.comment: Code specifying the weight unit

Field.name: UnitWeight2
Field.comment: Numeric value of weight per unit

Field.name: WeightQualifier2
Field.comment: Code defining the type of weight

Field.name: WeightUnitCode2
Field.comment: Code specifying the weight unit

Field.name: ProductServiceIdQualifier3
Field.comment: Code identifying the type/source of the descriptive number used in Product/Service ID (234)

Field.name: ProductServiceId3
Field.comment: Identifying number for a product or service

Field.name: FreeFormDescription
Field.comment: Free-form descriptive text

Field.name: InnerPack
Field.comment: The number of eaches per inner container

Field.name: PackagingCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the type of packaging; Part 1: Packaging Form, Part 2: Packaging Material; if the Data Element is used, then Part 1 is always required
